patch.title: A Link to the Past Redux
patch.tooltip: A Redux adjusted version of the vanilla game that offers Quality-of-Life (QoL) tweaks{0}- Supported: Rev 0 (US)

patch.title: The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Worlds (v1.23)
patch.tooltip: A full-sized ROM hack in a completely new setting, which can be quite difficult{0}- Supported: Rev 0 (US)

patch.title: The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Remodel (v1.1)
patch.tooltip: An easier and more vanilla-like balanced version of the Parallel Worlds ROM hack{0}- Supported: Rev 0 (US)
